channel.title: Syndicate 639 (Spawn) | Dicing | Killstreaks | Perks | 24/7 PKing |
channel.description:
Website home page is undergoing a revamp.
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/3IbsX.png[/img]
[URL=http://www.syndicate639.com/]Website[/URL] [URL=http://www.syndicate639.com/forum/]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://www.syndicate639.com/Syndicate639.jar]Download Client (3MB)[/URL] [URL=http://www.syndicate639.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/URL][/CENTER]
[B][COLOR=#FF0000]STOP RIGHT THERE![/COLOR][/B] Why should you join Syndicate 639? Well here are a few reasons:
[ul][*]-[b]Win PayPal cash[/b]: [url=http://www.syndicate639.com/forum/index.php?/topic/6-monthly-competitions-win-paypal-cash/]here[/url] [*]-[b]Fun and unique minigames[/b]: Call of Duty Black OPs Gun Game (but with swords) and more. [*]-[b]Killstreaks and perks[/b]: earn bonus damage, care packages and more. [*]-[b]SafePK[/b]: per kill here you earn 500k x current killstreak. [*]-[b]Numerous dangerous PK locations[/b]: ::edge, ::mb, ::easts, ::wests etc. [*]-[b]Dicing[/b]: trusted players are given the official rank, although anyone may host or dice. [*]-[b]Choose between spawn or an economy server[/b]. [*]-[b]HD/fullscreen[/b]. [*]-[b]Player Statistics[/b]: highest hit, kills, deaths etc. [*]-[b]Achievements[/b]: earn achievements by completing certain tasks, with rewards. [*]-[b]Spawning costs coins[/b]: easy to make money, just PK at safe for no risk cash rewards! [*]-[b]Free welfare gear, runes and potions[/b]: for quick and easy access. Get straight to PKing for free to make your cash! [*]-[b]Lowest donation prices[/b]: we are [b][u]not[/b][/u] a "pay2win" server. NO "donator only" items exist [*]-[b]Professional[/b]: ran by adults, not kids. [*]-[b]Freedom[/b]: you WON'T be muted or banned for swearing or trivial matters. In fact, we don't have time for it.[/ul]
[B][COLOR=#FF0000]MEDIA[/COLOR][/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/3NUCn.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3NduW.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/396fq.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3O9yX.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3MZsu.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3O1hQ.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39AlV.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39A1P.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39BKP.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/39Bum.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

The following bug fixes have been applied:

[ul][]You can no loner spawn Morrigan’s
[]All PvP armour in the PKP shop no longer require donator to equip
[*]You can no longer buy a chaotic rapier for 800k and sell it for 200m[/ul]

In other news:
-The ability for a username has been added (contact an admin if you wish to change your name, will cost a small fee)
-A new forum theme has been added. Looks a bit better than the default, let me know what you think.

Read full topic

item.title: Syndicate 639 (Spawn) | Dicing | Killstreaks | Perks | 24/7 PKing |
item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

arham 4:

Did u do all the perks I asked to do?

They are next, been taking care of a few necessary updates as of yesterday and today. You’ll probably see them tomorrow or the next day.

Today’s updates are as follows:

Safe PK
You can teleport to Varrock west bank via ::safe, ::safepk or ::pk. The west bank is a safe area and the surrounding red area is PK territory.

You will not lose your items if you die here, instead, the victor of the fight will receive coins corresponding to the amount damage you deal per fight x 1000.

Dicing/Gambling

A trusted Dicer rank has been added. Anyone may host dicing if they wish, but it is only recommended you gamble with players who have this trust rank next to their name.

It is in no way a guarantee that these people are 100% trustworthy, but they are people who stand out in the community enough to be trusted with the rank.

Players can self submit their own dicing rank application [iurl=#]here[/iurl] and then each week the whole community will have the chance to vote on who deserves the rank.

You will be able to decide who obtains these ranks!

In other news:

[ul][]Welfare items now sell for 0 coins in the store.
[]You can no longer spawn blue partyhats, godsword pieces or Dungeoneering armour and weapons.
[]::yell now works for free players (tweaked from yesterday).
[]Shopkeeper no long walks through his shop wall.
[]Some new commands have been added:
[list]
[]::west | ::wests | ::westdrags - teleports you to level 14 wild.
[]::east | ::easts | ::eastdrags - teleports you to level 21 wild.
[]::jad | ::hills | ::hillz - teleports you to hills, where Jad is located.
[]::home | ::edge - teleports you to Edgeville (dangerous PK).
[]::mb | ::magebank - teleports you to Mage Bank (dangerous PK).
[/list][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Syndicate 639 (Spawn) | Dicing | Killstreaks | Perks | 24/7 PKing |
item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

Thanks, Mark. To anyone reading this, if you see something you don’t like, could you please let me know so I can improve on it. Thanks.

It was taken into consideration from the feed back of the players that spawning items one by one was annoying and slow, so as a result you can now spawn welfare gear for melee, mage and range, some vengeance and barrage runes, and some potions, via commands.

These welfare commands are free to spawn, whereas it will still cost you coins to spawn individual items, including items that are in the commands themselves.

The new commands are as follows:

ul::welfaremelee

In other news:

ulThe ::yell command has been made available for free players until we gain more players.
*Global shouts for killstreaks and highest hit milestones have been enabled for free players until we gain new players.
*An online counter has been added upon log in (can still use ::players).[/ul]

Important links:

What makes a spawn server great for you?

Thanks for all the great feed back so far, keep it coming! It is best to document it on the forums and not tell me in game so I can keep track of it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Syndicate 639 (Spawn) | Dicing | Killstreaks | Perks | 24/7 PKing |
item.dc:creator: @PK_Syndicate PK Syndicate
item.description:
@PK_Syndicate wrote:

Website home page is undergoing a revamp.

[CENTER]

Website
Forums
Download Client (3MB)
Webclient[/CENTER]

[COLOR=#FF0000]STOP RIGHT THERE![/COLOR]
Why should you join Syndicate 639? Well here are a few reasons:

[ul][]-Win PayPal cash: here
[]-Fun and unique minigames: Call of Duty Black OPs Gun Game (but with swords) and more.
[]-Killstreaks and perks: earn bonus damage, care packages and more.
[]-SafePK: per kill here you earn 500k x current killstreak.
[]-Numerous dangerous PK locations: ::edge, ::mb, ::easts, ::wests etc.
[]-Dicing: trusted players are given the official rank, although anyone may host or dice.
[]-Choose between spawn or an economy server.
[]-HD/fullscreen.
[]-Player Statistics: highest hit, kills, deaths etc.
[]-Achievements: earn achievements by completing certain tasks, with rewards.
[]-Spawning costs coins: easy to make money, just PK at safe for no risk cash rewards!
[]-Free welfare gear, runes and potions: for quick and easy access. Get straight to PKing for free to make your cash!
[]-Lowest donation prices: we are [u]not[/u] a “pay2win” server. NO “donator only” items exist
[]-Professional: ran by adults, not kids.
[*]-Freedom: you WON’T be muted or banned for swearing or trivial matters. In fact, we don’t have time for it.[/ul]

[COLOR=#FF0000]MEDIA[/COLOR]










[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3GUOm8mQHN0[/youtube]
